text:
I have what’s maybe a dumb question… Do the new Drag-N-Drop areas in a theme only work with HubSpot default modules?  I can’t seem to get any of my existing custom modules to render or work correctly when dropping them in.

What am I missing?
no they do work with custom modules as well. Do you use the Drag and Drop Hubl Tags? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags/dnd-areas>
Hey <@UBT0AHWLD>.  Yeah, I have the dnd_area’s set up in Hubl as well.  I’ll show you what I’m seeing
Thanks <@UU34NMHJB>! We’ll talk through adding some new themes fields on our side
<@UA5DFM7CK> Mind PM’ing me a link to that page so I can take a look?
<@U22PWJ41G> helped me solve this!  The issue was the workflow field that was included in the module and throwing errors.  Chris, you are a dev-rockstar. Thanks man!
